to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: linux connection dying?
body:
Hello list,
I've got a question.
LInux will apparently die for no reason.
It still is on the network, and running.
But, it loses its Set IP.
Any reason why it would be doing this?
I had to unplug the eithernet cable, and do
ifconfig eth0 up 192.168.1.232
Boggle.
Thanks,
~~TheCreator~~
